items.title: Tested: Baseus’ 245W Nomos 6-in-1 charging station is a capable desktop charger that can do it all
items.summary:
There’s no shortage of multi-device charging stations out there, but most force you to choose between wireless charging or USB-C ports for wired accessories like, say, a MacBook or an iPad. You usually get one or the other, which is a mildly annoying inconvenience Baseus is trying to resolve this with its new 245W Nomos charging station which we’re checking out today. This model packs two retractable cables, four USB-C ports, two USB-A ports, and a 15W Qi2 wireless charging pad. It’s touted to be an ultimate all-in-one solution for your desk, but does it actually deliver? I’ve been using it as my main desktop charging station for the past few weeks to see how it holds up, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
